titles.title: A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the designation by the Secretary of Defense and the Secretaries of the military departments of installations of the Department of Defense as "remote" or "isolated", and for other purposes.

A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the designation by the Secretary of Defense and the Secretaries of the military departments of installations of the Department of Defense as "remote" or "isolated", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
